serviceAccountKey.title: Service Account Key
serviceAccountKey.description: Service account key in JSON format. You can get it from Firebase Console -> Project Settings -> Service accounts -> Generate new private key.

deviceTokens.title: Device Tokens
deviceTokens.description: Array of device tokens to send the message to.

topic.title: Topic
topic.description: Topic to send the message to.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Condition to send the message to.

notification.title: Notification
notification.description: Notification object to send. See https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/fcm/rest/v1/projects.messages#resource:-message for more details.

data.title: Data
data.description: Data object to send. See https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/fcm/rest/v1/projects.messages#resource:-message for more details.

android.title: Android
android.description: Android specific options. See https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/fcm/rest/v1/projects.messages#androidconfig for more details.

webPush.title: WebPush
webPush.description: WebPush specific options. See https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/fcm/rest/v1/projects.messages#webpushconfig for more details.

apns.title: APNs
apns.description: APNs specific options. See https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/fcm/rest/v1/projects.messages#apnsconfig for more details.

fcmOptions.title: FCM Options
fcmOptions.description: FCM options. See https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/fcm/rest/v1/projects.messages#fcmoptions for more details.
